newsitem.headline: NOTICE OF SALE - Sparta, N.J.

text.p: The Board of Education of the Township of Sparta
SEALED PROPOSALS will be received by the Board Secretary of the Board of Education at the Administrative Offices of the Board of Education, 328 Sparta Avenue, Sparta, N.J. on
until 11:00 a.m. for the purchase of the above Bonds of the School District dated September 1, 1996 and due (subject to prior redemption) on September 1 as follows:
Year Amount Year Amount Year Amount Year Amount 1998 $550,000 2006 $800,000 2013$1,100,000 2020 $1,100,000
The Bonds will be issued in book-entry form only, in the form of one certificate for the aggregate principal amount of the Bonds maturing in each year. The Bonds are

redeemable at the option of the Board in accordance with the terms set forth in the full Notice of Sale. The Board will furnish Bonds and the approving legal opinion of McManimon & Scotland, Newark, N.J.

The Bonds will bear interest at the rate or rates per annum in multiples of 1/8 or 1/20 of 1% (ascending rates and only one rate per maturity) specified by the successful bidder payable semiannually on March 1 and September 1 in each year until maturity, commencing on September 1, 1997. The Bonds will be awarded to the bidder on whose bid the total loan may be made at the lowest net interest cost in accordance with the terms set forth in the full Notice of Sale.

The full Notice of Sale, the Official Statement and bid forms are available by contacting Ronald J. Wolfe, the Board Secretary at Sparta Board of Education, 328 Sparta Avenue, Sparta, N.J. 07871, (201) 729-2155.
